item.description:
NEW! Sign up for Free Text Message Alert for Members!!! Go to www.textmarks.com/FUNWITHALCOHOL or simply text, FUNWITHALCOHOL and send to 41411

Happy Hour Snacks + Drinks Harvard SQ Cambridge

Happy Hour is nightly from 5:00 pm to 7:30 pm during which times all food on the menu is half price with a $3 minimum beverage purchase per person.

I will be in the raised half level, beyond the bar, trying to grab the "big round table". Note if we get lots of yeses we may split up into 2 tables. Please try to come at or Before 5:00PM by almost 5:15PM the place is full and I doubt we can get or hold any tables if people come too late.

If you come after 5:15 PM I cannot be sure you all will be sitting together at one table with our group, I just wanted to warn people!

Grendels Den has been serving casual gourmet dishes and international specialties in the same location for over 35 years. They have a full bar and an beer selection reknown for its high quality selection of imports, microbrews and hot cider with rum. Happy Hour is nightly from 5:00 pm to 7:30 pm during which times all food on the menu is half price with a $3 minimum beverage purchase per person.

This is an easy T accessible event as well. I hope many of you will be available to join us!
item.how_to_find_us: Sign up for FREE TEXT MESSAGE ALERT send text, FUNWITHALCOHOL to 41411
item.name: GRENDEL'S DEN
